reviews.review_msg: This guy is an absolute jerk. He has copy-and-paste responses to your essays. He doesn't read carefully and there are ridiculously vague questions and he's clearly looking for a specific answer. You have no freedom in your writing and you will always be wrong/ He always says I've done citations wrong when I've followed his ridiculous format exactly

Do not take this class! This buddy doesn't even tell you what you did wrong, if you get your paper back be prepared for the following advice; 1) Revision of what the question is 2) not enough citations 3) get help... It's not worth it just take another class. P.S. the rating of 2 is me being generous.

Had Oliver as a TA. His feedback was inconsistent, it was as if my feedback was not personalized to my work like he just copied and pasted some random feedback for me. I had a personal situation come up, he was not very considerate, even during this pandemic where I think people should be more than ever! Personally will avoid him in future.

Doesn't give you any feedback on your paper, only repeats what was said in his outline as if it were actual feedback. Takes lots of marks off for petty things in your paper. Don't expect to get anything over 70% on your submissions even if you are a great writer. His background doesn't even come from this department. Any other TA would be better.
